title: Botanic man. - Volume 3: Episodes 8-10.
creator_credit: Graeme Duckham, Robert Fleming, Randal Beattie and Thames Television International
brief_description: A compilation of David Bellamy’s “Life on the limit”, Extinction is forever”, and “Crackpot jackpot”. Contents include the ecological consequences of agriculture, the extinction of species, and the human role in evolution.
creator_credit_for_label: Graeme Duckham, Robert Fleming, Randal Beattie and Thames Television International
